content.raw:
I just realized that names in messages are scoped while on SDF they aren't. This is valid not only for joints but for links, visuals and collisions as well. It would be nice to remove everything before the last `::` before setting it at the SDF.

Example message from the double pendulum:
~~~
name: "double_pendulum_with_base::lower_joint"
id: 42
angle: 0
type: REVOLUTE
parent: "double_pendulum_with_base::upper_link"
parent_id: 19
child: "double_pendulum_with_base::lower_link"
child_id: 32
...
~~~

Corresponding SDF:
~~~
    <joint name="lower_joint" type="revolute">
      <parent>upper_link</parent>
      <child>lower_link</child>
...
~~~
